sentences.en: Adieu, my dear friend, and believe me ever yours very sincerely and with unalterable affection.
sentences.cn: 再见, 我亲爱的朋友, 请相信我永远是你最忠实的朋友,对你有着不渝的爱.

sentences.en: At first blush , land is seen as a fixed or unalterable resource.
sentences.cn: 乍一看土地是一种固定的,或者说是不可改变的资源.

sentences.en: Gravity is unalterable but the forms to reflect gravity are diverse.
sentences.cn: 重力是不变的,回应重力的方式是多样的.

sentences.en: Heb .7:24 But He , because He abides forever, has His priesthood unalterable.
sentences.cn: 来七24但耶稣既是永远长存的, 他就有不能更换的祭司职分.

sentences.en: I gave him unalterable responsibility, even be betrayed!
sentences.cn: 我赋予他在任何情况下都必须肩挑责任, 即使背叛!

sentences.en: Objects are just what constitute this unalterable form.
sentences.cn: 诸事物形成不变的形式.

sentences.en: Objects are what is unalterable and subsistent; their configuration is what is changing and unstable.
sentences.cn: 0271对象是不变的和实存的; 它们的配置则是可变的和不定的.

sentences.en: Organic - inorganic interactions are ubiquitous and unalterable in sedimentary basins.
sentences.cn: 有机 — 无机相互作用是沉积盆地中普遍存在且不可改变的事实.

sentences.en: She had sacrificed herself to a conception of loyalty that was private and unalterable.
sentences.cn: 她为了一种内心的,不可改变的忠贞概念而牺牲了自己.

sentences.en: The conclusion, and arguments of this book is unalterable truth.
sentences.cn: 这本著作的结论和观点已是不刊之论.

sentences.en: The general trend of history is unalterable.
sentences.cn: 历史发展的总趋势是不可改变的.

sentences.en: The island - state's unalterable fragility is beyond dispute.
sentences.cn: 新加坡的脆弱,是谁也无法否认及改变的事实.

sentences.en: The law must be steady, but not unalterable.
sentences.cn: 法律必须是稳定, 但也不是一成不变的.

sentences.en: the unalterable laws of the universe
They arbitrarily apply what they imagine to be an unalterable formula everywhere.
sentences.cn: 他们使用一种自以为不可改变的公式到处硬套.

words.tran_cn: 不变的；未被改变的；照旧的
不可改变地，坚定不移地
不能改变的；坚定不移的

trans.tran_cn: 不可改变的，固定不变的，不刊，不可移易
